SELECT SEQ_REVIEW.nextval FROM DUAL
insert into TBL_REVIEW (REVIEW_ID, PILL_ID, MEMBER_ID, POINT, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_GENDER, REVIEW_AGE, REVIEW_SHAPE) values (#{reviewId}, #{pillId}, #{memberId}, #{point}, #{reviewTitle}, #{reviewContent}, #{reviewGender}, #{reviewAge}, #{reviewShape})
mapper.select: SELECT R.REVIEW_ID, R.PILL_ID, R.MEMBER_ID, R.POINT, R.MODIFIED_DATE, R.REVIEW_CONTENT, R.REVIEW_SHAPE, R.REVIEW_AGE, R.REVIEW_GENDER, R.REVIEW_TITLE, P.COMPANY_NAME, P.PILL_NAME, M.NAME FROM TBL_REVIEW R JOIN TBL_PILL P ON R.PILL_ID = P.PILL_ID JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON R.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID WHERE R.REVIEW_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR P.PILL_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR P.COMPANY_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR M.NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY R.REVIEW_ID DESC
SELECT P.PILL_ID, P.PILL_NAME FROM TBL_PILL P WHERE P.PILL_NAME LIKE '%'|| #{pillName} ||'%' ORDER BY P.PILL_ID
